name: Illusive Gnome Style
text: The chaotic, somewhat random design of your racial weapons makes it easy to combine them with illusions.
prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Gnome Weapon Focus, Improved Feint, base attack bonus +1, gnome magic and weapon familiarity racial traits.
benefit: While feinting with a melee weapon that has “gnome” in its name, you can sacrifice a spell slot, a spell of the illusion school, or a spell from the gnome magic racial trait to gain a bonus on the skill check attempted to feint. This bonus is equal to 1 + the level of the spell sacrificed. If you sacrifice a 0-level spell, you cannot cast or sacrifice that spell again for 24 hours.
text_zh: 造型奔放、设计怪异的侏儒兵器很容易和幻术形成组合技。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，寓守于攻，侏儒武器专攻，精通虚招，BAB+1，侏儒魔法（Gnome Magic）与武器熟悉（Weapon Familiarity）种族特性。
benefit_zh: 当你以冠有“侏儒（gnome）”之名的近战武器进行虚招时，能够牺牲一个法术位（spell slot）、一个幻术学派的法术、或者一个来自侏儒魔法种族特性的法术，并以此来在尝试虚招的技能检定中获得加值。这个加值为1 + 被牺牲的法术环级。如果你牺牲的是0级法术，则在24小时内无法施放或者牺牲该法术。
